summary: This is a court notice from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals regarding the case United States v. Maxwell. It indicates that a Form B document was filed on behalf of appellant Ghislaine Maxwell, and provides service information for attorneys involved in the case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the case United States v. Maxwell, filing a Form B document through her legal representation.

persons.name: Christian Romeyn Everdell
persons.context: Assistant U.S. Attorney representing the government in the case, listed for electronic notice service.

persons.name: Bobbi C. Stemheim
persons.context: Attorney listed for electronic notice service, likely part of the legal team involved in the case.

persons.name: Tammy Tones
persons.context: Court deputy clerk responsible for quality control, listed for notice storage.

connections.description: Stemheim appears to be part of Maxwell's legal team filing documents on her behalf.
Everdell is the Assistant U.S. Attorney prosecuting the case against Maxwell.

events.title: Form B Filing in Maxwell Appeal
events.description: A Form B document was filed on behalf of appellant Ghislaine Maxwell in the Second Circuit Court of Appeals.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell is appealing her case in the Second Circuit Court of Appeals (Case Number: 21-58).
A Form B document was filed on January 26, 2021, on behalf of Maxwell as part of the appellate process.
The document includes service information for attorneys Christian Romeyn Everdell (Assistant U.S. Attorney) and Bobbi C. Stemheim (likely Maxwell's attorney).
The case is officially titled 'United States of America v. Maxwell' in the appellate court.
